outdoor.name: Mt. Woodson Trial
outdoor.desc:
Potato Chip Rock via Mt. Woodson Trail is a 6.9 mile heavily trafficked out 
							and back trail located near Poway, CA that features a lake and is rated as moderate. 
							The trail offers a number of activity options and is accessible year-round.
			 				Dogs are also able to use this trail but must be kept on leash.

outdoor.name: East County San Diego
outdoor.desc:
About an hour’s drive east of Downtown, Laguna Mountain sits at 6,000 feet above the sea
							 on the edge of the Cleveland National Forest. Mountain bike through the Jeffrey Pineson
							  one of several trails based on level of difficulty.
outdoor.address: One Father Junipero Serra Trail, San Diego, CA 92119-1008

outdoor.name: La Jolla Shores
outdoor.desc:
La Jolla’s grandeur is nowhere more evident than along its coastline, where you'll find some of 
							the most breathtaking beaches in California. Dramatic cliffs, sandy expanses and secluded coves,
							 La Jolla offers a range of beaches to please everyone—whether your interest is sunbathing, swimming, 
							 surfing... or seals!
outdoor.address: 8300 Camino Del Oro, La Jolla, CA 92037

indoor.name: AMC Mission Valley 20
indoor.desc: Enjoy a movie with a friend
indoor.address:
1640 Camino Del Rio, North
							San Diego, CA 92108

indoor.name: Kroc Center Ice
indoor.desc:
As the only year-round ice arena centrally located in the heart of San Diego, Kroc Center Ice 
							offers public ice skating sessions, learn to skate and learn to play hockey classes, youth and
							 adult hockey leagues, and figure skating.

indoor.name: Karaoke 101
indoor.desc:
Karaoke 101 is proud to serve the great San Diego area with ten private karaoke rooms. Our customized 
							karaoke program provides English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Taiwanese songs.
indoor.address: 7578 Clairemont Mesa Blvd, San Diego, CA 92111

tourist activity.name: San Diego Zoo
tourist activity.desc:
The San Diego Zoo is a zoo in Balboa Park, San Diego, California, housing over 3,700 animals of 
							more than 650 species and subspecies.

tourist activity.name: Balboa Park
tourist activity.desc:
Balboa Park is a 1,200-acre urban cultural park in San Diego, California, United States.
							In addition to open space areas, natural vegetation zones, green belts, gardens, and walking paths, 
							it contains museums, several theaters, and the world-famous San Diego Zoo.

tourist activity.name: SeaWorld San Diego
tourist activity.desc:
SeaWorld San Diego is an animal theme park, oceanarium, outside aquarium, and marine mammal park,
							 located in San Diego, California, United States.
tourist activity.address: 500 Sea World Dr, San Diego, CA 92109

dining.name: Phil's BBQ
dining.desc:
Phil's BBQ is a barbeque restaurant that was founded by Phil Pace. In 1998, he opened it in the 
							Mission Hills in San Diego, California and other areas. It has received positive reception both 
							in terms of its reviews as well as its success.
dining.address: 3750 Sports Arena Blvd, San Diego, CA 92110

dining.name: RB Sushi
dining.desc: Casual spot offering all-you-can-eat sushi, noodle soups & cooked fare, plus sake, wine & cocktails.

dining.name: Manna BBQ
dining.desc: Big portions of table-grilled fare & familiar sides in a casual setting inside a strip mall.

shopping.name: Fashion Valley
shopping.desc: Fashion Valley Mall is an upscale, open-air shopping mall in Mission Valley in San Diego, California.

shopping.name: Westfield Mission Valley
shopping.desc:
Westfield Mission Valley, formerly Mission Valley Center, is a shopping mall in Mission Valley area of San Diego, 
							California, owned by The Westfield Group
shopping.address: 1640 Camino Del Rio N, San Diego, CA 92108

shopping.name: Westfield Horton Plaza
shopping.desc: Find your favourite store and the newest shops for fashion, beauty, lifestyle and fresh food only at Westfield Horton Plaza.
